TopicTitle: What will you do in KSP2?

Articles.Content: When KSP2 releases what do you plan to do? What missions will you hold? Where will you go? And all those things. What do you plan to do? You can list a bunch of missions you plan to do here or just one.

Enjoy every aspect of exploring and advancing that tech tree! Must Colonize Everything!

 

MUST BUILD THE KERBAL GALACTIC EMPIRE!!!
Push the 1000 parts stability to its limits, make the biggest most self sufficient ship that i can

1) Attempt to hold my breath until mechjeb is ported to KSP2

2) Fail at number 1

3) Attempt a career save without mechjeb

4) Fail miserably at number 3

5) Shriek loudly until I get automated rendezvous, docking, and interplanetary transfer functionality

6) Enjoy delicious porkchop plots

Start the game, build a rocket, go to space, then wait for an autopilot so I can actually land on the moon/planet in the same spot, then start a colony, build more rockets, advance until interstellar.
Absolute first thing? Launch a Sandbox mode and check out all the new stuff, get a feel for the new engine physics and such
probably build an aircraft in sandbox mode and look around ksc. then make a kolony on minmuss or kerbin if its possible to see how they work

1. Take a look at the ksp2 celestial bodies.
  2. Test the orion engine in the atmosphere in the sandbox mod.
  3. Take a look at the types of propulsion.
  4. Launch a Micro-satellite.
  5. Build a station around self-sustaining Kerbin in the Sandbox mod.
immediately install rss ro and see how it runs
